name: CloudCodes Software Private Limited
description:
CloudCodes was founded in 2011. CloudCodes believes in enabling millions of Google Apps customers across the world in maximizing their utilization of their Google Apps investment through the ecosystem of its products and services. CloudCodes specializes in Google Apps platform and provides products that caters to administration and business requirement of the customer. It provides solution through its expertise in Google Apps Engine platform, Google Site and Google Apps Script.
CloudCodes comes with its own ecosystem of products which are build on Google App Engine platform such as gLogin, gFlow, gOne and gBuddy. It also provides Single Sign On integration with Active Directory, Moodle, LifeRay and any other legacy systems. Specialties Google App Engine, Google Site, Apps Script, Single Sign On, Integration with 3rd Party, Migration to Google Apps, Google Apps Training, Google Apps Deployment, Cloud Computing, Cloud Readyness
